==== Ekiga ====

Ekiga is a useful voip app for the gnome desktop.

'''Tests to try'''

** Run through the setup wizard one step at a time.
** Signup for an account if you don't have one.  This can be done from the setup wizard.
** ring "sip://500@ekiga.net" for echo loop test to set volume on speaker and mic.  It also tests the system is working correctly.
** If you have a webcam this is one app to test it.
** Finally make a test call.
